availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Salathiel W. Offutt (Hopkins County, Ky, coal digger )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, coal digger. Kentucky native. Son of John M. Offutt and Nancy Wright Offutt. Married to Rhonda A. Offutt. Father of William F. Offutt. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Coal digger in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 98A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 814.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 2, p. 40B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #20886.
"Salathiel William Offutt (1836-1911)," Find A Grave, Memorial #26973456, accessed October 13, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26973456.
